thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Join-Cheer Software to fully acquire communication tech firm for 800 mln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Join-Cheer Software to fully acquire communication tech firm for 800 mln yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - beijing join-cheer software co ltd

text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Beijing Join-Cheer Software Co Ltd :
* Says it plans to buy 49 percent stake in a Shanghai-based communication tech company for 800 million yuan
* The company will hold 100 percent stake in target company after transaction
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/9Rh4xV
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
